generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and traffic signs, indicating it is a road for vehicles.
- building: A large modern building with glass windows and a concrete facade is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and greenery along the sides of the road and in front of the building.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and building, showing a partly cloudy sky.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver convertible in the center and a white van on the left.
- pole: There are multiple poles visible, including traffic sign poles and utility poles.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a "No Entry" sign, a "No Parking" sign, and directional signs.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk near the building on the right.
